name: land-registry-price-paid-data-quality
title: Land Registry Price Paid Data Quality
description: An overview of 16 columns of data from the Land Registry Open dataset focusing on common data quality attributes. The overview was produced using Experian Pandora.

resources.name: Land Registry Price Paid Column Stats
resources.description: A Data Quality attributes overview focusing on uniqueness, completeness and other common format characteristics of the Land Registry Open Data. Produced using Experian Pandora.

resources.name: Land Registry Price Paid Outlier Stats
resources.description: A more detailed assessment of the key data quality issues that may impact the utility of the Land Registry Price Paid data. The assessment calls out issues such as duplicate transactions, poorly formatted addresses and missing postcodes. This assessment can be reproduced using Experian Pandora Free Data Profiler.
